channel.title: You lose this item on death
channel.description:
Okay, In my server you keep 3 items, and that's 3 wealthy items, but after some creepy researching i've found out that you lose DClaws on that and that you don't keep it even if you have bronze armor on you!
So i want to know how to do it so you ALWAYS Keep the claws whatever happens!
Please tell me how!
